title: Welcome to Brickell
abstract: Brickell is a modern, upscale neighborhood in Miami, known for its luxury high-rises, vibrant nightlife, and fine dining. It's the perfect place to experience the best of urban living with a touch of sophistication.

services.title: Wine Tour
services.intro: Spend too much money on Brickell's expensive wines.

services.title: Areas
services.intro: Keep in mind where closes early.

services.title: Car Transportation
services.intro: Cool cars to look out for.

packages.title: Cocktail Tour No Alcohol
packages.description: Experience fruit beverages with no alcohol.

packages.title: Rooftop Brunch
packages.description: Experience a nice brunch at the super rooftop.

packages.title: Rooftop Dinner
packages.description: Experience a rooftop dinner that is expensive.

packages.title: Brickell Boat Cruise
packages.description: Enjoy a relaxing boat cruise through Brickell's waters with stunning skyline views.

packages.title: Brickell Sunset Yoga
packages.description: Join a peaceful yoga session on the rooftop as the sun sets over Brickell.

packages.title: Brickell Art Walk
packages.description: Explore local art galleries and murals on a guided walk through Brickell's vibrant streets.
